name: TheCanvasSeries 00 nude // DIY your POWER DRESS
description:
TheCanvasSeries....DIY your 80s powerdress!

Dress made from naturecoloured cotton.
Simply beautiful dress in the current nudelook.
It is tightly cut, with puffy sleeves in 2/3 length.

I am producing a line of my clothes made from plain cotton, as you know it from canvases or tote-bags. I call this line "TheCanvasSeries" as I invite my customers as well as a range of selected artiststo design these pieces.

The dress is the canvas. It can be painted, glued, batiked, coloured, embroidered...whatever you like!

And I would love to receive images of the dresses designed by you!

Of course, you can also just leave the dress white, since it is simply beautiful like that. It is also available in other coulours.

Size/Weight/Dimensions
xs, s, m, l

in case of any questions, just contact me!

Materials utilised
cotton, yarn, zipper

Production method
sewing, design

name: SUMMER pink, grey, green necklace with silver
description:
beautiful, amazing, necklace from cords in pink, green and silver cords made from shimmering yarn. and a piece of chain coloured in silver.

the cords have a length of about 50cm , the golden chain about 25 cm, so in total the necklace measures 75 cm.

it is long enough to wrap 1x around the neck and can be worn in many different ways.

it is a stunning piece of accessory, which will make a great impact on a summer-outfit!



ELEANOR ROT
is a young fashion label based in Portugal and Germany.

Our pieces transmit feelings of strength and selfesteem to the woman wearing them, while at the same time, they require a bit of courage as well.

Inspiration for the ELEANOR ROT collections are adventurous citygirls, who like to dress fashionable and at the same time convenient and comfortable.

Clear lines and cuts, strong colours and a reduced use of patterns are the signatures of ELEANOR ROT.

Our fundamental inspirations are the fun of fashion and trends, mixed with a fondness of experimental ideas and combinations, as well as a borderline perception of women between femininity and strength, rooted in the Powerlook of the 80s.

The collections of ELEANOR ROT are designed and produced in small editions and with a great deal of care, in Porto, Portugal.

Porto is a beautiful city in the north of Portugal and the traditional centre of the portuguese textile- and leather industries.

The designer behind ELEANOR ROT, Nora Oertel, is german and travelling between the german and portuguese worlds. ELEANOR ROT is also a mirror of these cultural journeys, a mixture between german minimalism and the colours of southern Europe.

Size/Weight/Dimensions
about 75 cm length

Materials utilised
cord, yarn, elastic band, chain

Production method
sewing, design, handmade

Customisation options
colour, size

name: TheCanvasSeries/00/nude // DIY your Tulipdress
description:
TheCanvasSeries....DIY your Tulipdress!

Tulipdress made from naturecoloured cotton.
Simply beautiful dress in the current nudelook.
The top is tightly cut, the skirt ist tulipshaped and has 2 pockets.

I am producing a line of my clothes made from plain cotton, as you know it from canvases or tote-bags. I call this line "TheCanvasSeries" as I invite my customers as well as a range of selected artiststo design these pieces.

The dress is the canvas. It can be painted, glued, batiked, coloured, embroidered...whatever you like!

And I would love to receive images of the dresses designed by you!

Of course, you can also just leave the dress white, since it is simply beautiful like that. It is also available in other coulours.

Size/Weight/Dimensions

xs-l

in case of any questions, just contact me!

name: Little black dress with hoody-scarf and 100 buttons
description:
Little Black Dress with hoody scarf and 100 buttons.

The scarf can be attached to the buttons, however also without the scarf the dress has an amazing rock/industrial look!

To see more pictures of the dress, please follow this link: http://eleanorrot.blogspot.com/2010/03/eleanor-rot-for-absolut-crafts.html

Black minidress with halflong puffy-sleeves, shoulder pads included.

Dress closes with metal zipper in the back.
